詽字的基本解释

詽
yán
易怒而好与人争论。

詽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yán］
［《廣韻》五閑切，平山，疑。］
“訮1”的旧字形。
性情暴躁，好与人争论。

詽字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　詽； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1160第01
【唐韻】呼堅切【廣韻】呼煙切【集韻】馨煙切，?顯平聲。【說文】諍語詽詽也。【類篇】訶也，怒也。　又人名。汝詽，見【宋史·宗室表】。　又【廣韻】他前切，音天。訶貌。　又【廣韻】五閑切【集韻】牛閑切，?眼平聲。訟也，爭也。

詽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
詽字的起名意思

暂无。

詽
Basic explanation of words
詽
yán
Irritable and easy to argue with people.
詽
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yán］
["Guangyun" Five free cuts, Hirayama, doubt. ]
The old glyph of "訮1".
He has a grumpy temperament, so he can argue with others.
詽
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　詽; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1160 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Hu Jian cut [Guang Yun] Hu Yan cut [Ji Yun] Xin Yan cut,? The sound is flat. [Said the text] The idiom is also idiotic. [Class articles] He is also angry.　Another name. Ru Shi, see [Song History·Clan List].　[Guang Yun] He cuts forward, Yintian. Slander.　[Guangyun] Five free cuts [Jiyun] Cow free cuts, flat eyes. Litigation is also controversial.
